name: Ojiv
description:
Welcome to Ojiv!

Ojiv is a fast paced immersive rhythm game.

  • Groove along great beats while ripping apart clothings of anime girls.
  • Wide selection of handmade levels.
  • Different difficulty levels for everyone with every skill level to be able to enjoy this experience.
  • Variety of music genres.
  • Sexy villans for each music.



Use your quick reflexes and sense of rhythm to tap, hold, spam and swipe your way through each song, earning high scores and
unlocking new characters and songs as you progress. Plus, with intuitive controls and a challenging difficulty level, you'll be able to test your skills and see just how good you really are.



So come join the party and get ready to dance your heart out with Ojiv!
